00148   printf("Image dimension: %i, %i \n\n", img.nx, img.ny); 
00149 
00150   param_m1.nmeas = vis_test.nmeas;

00167   Nx=param_m2.ny1*param_m2.nx1;
00168   Nr=Nb*Nx;
00169   Ny=param_m2.nmeas;
00170 
00171   //Memory allocation for the different variables
00172   deconv = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00173   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(deconv);
00174   xinc = (complex double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(complex double));
00175   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xinc);
00176   xout = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));
00177   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(xout);
00178   y = (complex double*)malloc((vis_test.nmeas) * sizeof(complex double));
00179   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(y);

00201   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00202     xinc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00203   }

00207   for (i=0; i < img.ny; i++){
00208     for (j=0; j < img.nx; j++){
00209       xinc[i+j*param_m1.ny1] = img.pix[i+j*img.ny] + 0.0*I;
00210     }
00211   }
00212   
00213   //Initialize griding matrix
00214   assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00215   purify_measurement_init_cft(&gmat, deconv, vis_test.u, vis_test.v, &param_m1);
00216   stop = clock();
00217   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00218   printf("Time initalization: %f \n\n", t);
00219   
00220   //Memory allocation for the fft
00221   i = Nx*param_m1.ofy*param_m1.ofx;
00222   fft_temp1 = (complex double*)malloc((i) * sizeof(complex double));
00223   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp1);
00224   fft_temp2 = (complex double*)malloc((i) * sizeof(complex double));
00225   PURIFY_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fft_temp2);
00226 
00227   //FFT plan  
00228   planfwd = fftw_plan_dft_2d(param_m1.nx1*param_m1.ofx, param_m1.ny1*param_m1.ofy, 
00229               fft_temp1, fft_temp1, 
00230               FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00231 
00232   planadj = fftw_plan_dft_2d(param_m1.nx1*param_m1.ofx, param_m1.ny1*param_m1.ofy, 
00233               fft_temp2, fft_temp2, 
00234               FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00235 
00236 
00237   datafwd[0] = (void*)&param_m1;
00238   datafwd[1] = (void*)deconv;

00240   datafwd[3] = (void*)&planfwd;
00241   datafwd[4] = (void*)fft_temp1;
00242 
00243   dataadj[0] = (void*)&param_m2;
00244   dataadj[1] = (void*)deconv;
00245   dataadj[2] = (void*)&gmat;
00246   dataadj[3] = (void*)&planadj;
00247   dataadj[4] = (void*)fft_temp2;
00248 
00249 
00250   printf("FFT plan done \n\n");

00254   purify_measurement_cftfwd((void*)y0, (void*)xinc, datafwd);
00255   stop = clock();
00256   t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00257   printf("Time forward operator: %f \n\n", t);
00258 
00259   
00260   //Noise realization
00261   //Input snr
00262   snr = 30.0;
00263   a = cblas_dznrm2(Ny, (void*)y0, 1);
00264   sigma = a*pow(10.0,-(snr/20.0))/sqrt(Ny);
00265 
00266     
00267   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00268       noise[i] = (sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn) + sopt_ran_gasdev2(seedn)*I)*(sigma/sqrt(2));
00269       y[i] = y0[i] + noise[i];
00270   }
00271 
00272   //Rescaling the measurements
00273 
00274   aux4 = (double)Ny/(double)Nx;
00275 
00276   for (i=0; i < Ny; i++) {
00277     y[i] = y[i]/sqrt(aux4);
00278   }
00279 
00280   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00281     deconv[i] = deconv[i]/sqrt(aux4);
00282   }
00283   
00284   
00285   // Output image.
00286   img_copy.fov_x = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00287   img_copy.fov_y = 1.0 / 180.0 * PURIFY_PI;
00288   img_copy.nx = param_m1.nx1;
00289   img_copy.ny = param_m1.ny1;
00290 
00291   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00292     xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00293   }
00294   
00295   //Dirty image
00296   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xoutc, (void*)y, dataadj);
00297 
00298   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00299     xout[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00300   }
00301 
00302   aux1 = purify_utils_maxarray(xout, Nx);
00303 
00304   
00305 
00306    img_copy.pix = (double*)malloc((Nx) * sizeof(double));

00318 
00319     param1.ndict = Nb;
00320     param1.real = 0;

00411 
00412   printf("**********************\n");
00413   printf("BPSA reconstruction\n");

00417     
00418   //Structure for the L1 solver      
00419   param4.verbose = 2;
00420   param4.max_iter = 300;
00421   param4.gamma = gamma*aux2;
00422   param4.rel_obj = 0.001;
00423   param4.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux4);
00424   param4.epsilon_tol = 0.01;
00425   param4.real_data = 0;
00426   param4.cg_max_iter = 100;

00428 
00429   
00430   //Initial solution

00432       xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00433   }
00434  
00435   #ifdef _OPENMP 
00436     start1 = omp_get_wtime();
00437   #else
00438     assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00439   #endif
00440   sopt_l1_sdmm((void*)xoutc, Nx,
00441                    &purify_measurement_cftfwd,
00442                    datafwd,
00443                    &purify_measurement_cftadj,
00444                    dataadj,
00445                    &sopt_sara_synthesisop,

00458   #endif
00459 
00460   printf("Time BPSA: %f \n\n", t); 
00461 
00462   
00463     //SNR

00465         error[i] = creal(xoutc[i])-xout[i];
00466     }
00467     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00468     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xout, 1);
00469     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00470     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);
00471 
00472

00475     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00476   }

00479 
00480   //Residual image
00481

00483   alpha = -1.0 +0.0*I;
00484   cblas_zaxpy(Ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, y0, 1);
00485   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xinc, (void*)y0, dataadj);

00500 
00501

00512   param5.sigma = sigma*sqrt((double)Ny/(double)Nr);

00514

00517   #else

00529                    Nr,

00531

00533     stop1 = omp_get_wtime();
00534     t = stop1 - start1;
00535   #else
00536     stop = clock();
00537     t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00538   #endif
00539

00580   
00581     printf("**********************\n");
00582     printf("TV reconstruction\n");

00585     
00586     //Structure for the TV prox
00587     param6.verbose = 1;
00588     param6.max_iter = 50;
00589     param6.rel_obj = 0.0001;
00590 
00591     
00592     //Structure for the TV solver    
00593     param7.verbose = 2;
00594     param7.max_iter = 300;
00595     param7.gamma = gamma*aux1;
00596     param7.rel_obj = 0.001;
00597     param7.epsilon = sqrt(Ny + 2*sqrt(Ny))*sigma/sqrt(aux4);
00598     param7.epsilon_tol = 0.01;
00599     param7.real_data = 0;
00600     param7.cg_max_iter = 100;

00602     param7.paramtv = param6;
00603 
00604     //Initial solution and weights
00605     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00606         xoutc[i] = 0.0 + 0.0*I;
00607         wdx[i] = 1.0;
00608         wdy[i] = 1.0;
00609     }
00610 
00611     
00612     assert((start = clock())!=-1);
00613     sopt_tv_sdmm((void*)xoutc, dimx, dimy,
00614                    &purify_measurement_cftfwd,
00615                    datafwd,
00616                    &purify_measurement_cftadj,
00617                    dataadj,
00618                    (void*)y, Ny, wdx, wdy, param7);
00619     stop = clock();
00620     t = (double) (stop-start)/CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00621     
00622     printf("Time TV: %f \n\n", t); 
00623 
00624     
00625    //SNR
00626     for (i=0; i < Nx; i++) {
00627         error[i] = creal(xoutc[i])-xout[i];
00628     }
00629     mse = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, error, 1);
00630     a = cblas_dnrm2(Nx, xout, 1);
00631     snr_out = 20.0*log10(a/mse);
00632     printf("SNR: %f dB\n\n", snr_out);
00633 
00634   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00635     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xoutc[i]);
00636   }
00637   
00638   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/m31tv.fits", filetype_img);
00639 
00640    //Residual image
00641 
00642   purify_measurement_cftfwd((void*)y0, (void*)xoutc, datafwd);
00643   alpha = -1.0 +0.0*I;
00644   cblas_zaxpy(Ny, (void*)&alpha, y, 1, y0, 1);
00645   purify_measurement_cftadj((void*)xinc, (void*)y0, dataadj);
00646 
00647   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00648     img_copy.pix[i] = creal(xinc[i]);
00649   }
00650   
00651   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/m31tvres.fits", filetype_img);
00652 
00653   //Error image
00654   for (i=0; i < Nx; i++){
00655     img_copy.pix[i] = error[i];
00656   }
00657   
00658   purify_image_writefile(&img_copy, "data/test/m31tverror.fits", filetype_img);
00659
